title: How to Remove Berry Stains

steps.headline: Boil about a quart of water over high heat.
Pour boiling water over berry stain.
To remove blackberry or blueberry stains, apply powder stain remover that has been rendered into a paste.
steps.description: Apply the paste on the stain and rub. Rinse in the hottest water safe for the fabric. Also try bleach alternative detergent. Apply directly on stain. Let sit then rub. Rinse. Repeat until stain is gone.

text: Boil about a quart of water over high heat.  Place stained garment in sink.  Pour boiling water over berry stain.  Watch the stain dissolve.  To remove blackberry or blueberry stains, apply powder stain remover that has been rendered into a paste. Apply the paste on the stain and rub. Rinse in the hottest water safe for the fabric. Also try bleach alternative detergent. Apply directly on stain. Let sit then rub. Rinse. Repeat until stain is gone.
